001package org.biopax.validator;
002
003import java.util.HashSet;
004import java.util.Set;
005
006import org.biopax.paxtools.controller.EditorMap;
007import org.biopax.paxtools.controller.PropertyEditor;
008import org.biopax.paxtools.model.BioPAXElement;
009import org.biopax.validator.api.ValidatorException;
010import org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Validation;
011
012/**
013 * Base BioPAX Rule for checking cardinality and range restrictions.
014 *
015 * @author rodche
016 *
017 * @param <E> extends BioPAXElement
018 */
019
020public abstract class AbstractCardinalityAndRangeRule<E extends BioPAXElement> 
021        extends AbstractRule<E> 
022{
023        protected EditorMap editorMap;
024        private final String property;
025        private final Class<E> domain;
026        private int minCardinality = 0;
027        private int maxCardinality = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
028        Class<?>[] ranges; // although the editor has range property, this is for stricter checks
029        String rangesAsString = "";
030        
031        // Constructor with arguments
032        public AbstractCardinalityAndRangeRule(
033                        Class<E> domain, String property, 
034                        int min, int max, Class<?>... ranges) {
035                this.domain = domain;
036                this.property = property;
037                this.minCardinality = (min >= 0) ? min : 0;
038                this.maxCardinality = (max > 0) ? max : Integer.MAX_VALUE;
039                this.ranges = ranges;
040                for(Class<?> cl : ranges) {
041                        rangesAsString += cl.getSimpleName() + " ";
042                }
043        }
044        
045        
046        public boolean canCheck(Object thing) {
047                return domain.isInstance(thing);
048        }
049        
050        public void check(Validation validation, E thing) {
051                PropertyEditor editor = 
052                        editorMap.getEditorForProperty(property, thing.getModelInterface());
053                if(editor == null) {
054                        throw new ValidatorException(
055                                "BUG in " + getClass().getSimpleName() +
056                                " rule: no editor exists for property '" + 
057                                                property + "' of " + domain);
058                }
059
060                //get value(s) from the property of the biopax obj; copy to avoid CMEx...
061                Set<?> ret = null;
062                //sync to get the property values (there're other rules in separate threads that might check/fix the same thing and property)
063                synchronized (thing) {
064                        ret = new HashSet<Object>(editor.getValueFromBean(thing));
065                }
066                        
067                int size = ret.size();
068                if (maxCardinality == minCardinality) {
069                        // exact cardinality check
070                        if (maxCardinality  > 0 
071                                        && maxCardinality < Integer.MAX_VALUE 
072                                        && size != maxCardinality) 
073                        {
074                                error(validation, thing, 
075                                                "cardinality.violated", false, editor.getProperty(), maxCardinality);
076                        }
077                } else {
078                        // min. cardinality check
079                        if (minCardinality > 0 && size == 0) {
080                                error(validation, thing, 
081                                                "min.cardinality.violated", false, editor.getProperty(), minCardinality);
082                        }
083                        // max. cardinality check
084                        if (maxCardinality > 0
085                                        && maxCardinality < Integer.MAX_VALUE
086                                        && size > maxCardinality) {
087                                error(validation, thing, 
088                                                "max.cardinality.violated", false, editor.getProperty(), maxCardinality);
089                        }
090                }
091                // check range
092                for (Object val : ret) {
093                        checkRange(validation, thing, val);
094                }
095        }
096        
097        private void checkRange(Validation validation, E thing, Object p) {
098                boolean isViolated = true;
099                for (Class<?> range : ranges) {
100                        if (range.isInstance(p)) {
101                                isViolated = false;
102                                break;
103                        }
104                }
105                if(isViolated) {
106                        error(validation, thing, "range.violated", 
107                                        false, getProperty(), 
108                                        p, p.getClass().getSimpleName(), rangesAsString);
109                }
110        }
111
112
113        public EditorMap getEditorMap() {
114                return editorMap;
115        }
116
117
118        public int getMinCardinality() {
119                return minCardinality;
120        }
121
122
123        public void setMinCardinality(int minCardinality) {
124                this.minCardinality = minCardinality;
125        }
126
127
128        public int getMaxCardinality() {
129                return maxCardinality;
130        }
131
132
133        public void setMaxCardinality(int maxCardinality) {
134                this.maxCardinality = maxCardinality;
135        }
136
137
138        public Class<?>[] getRanges() {
139                return ranges;
140        }
141
142
143        public void setRanges(Class<?>[] ranges) {
144                this.ranges = ranges;
145        }
146
147
148        public String getProperty() {
149                return property;
150        }
151
152
153        public Class<E> getDomain() {
154                return domain;
155        }       
156        
157}
